/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The road, a vein of the city, is teeming with life as cars and buses navigate their way. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the blue of the sky. The sky itself is a canvas of blue, with a smattering of clouds adding texture to the scene. The perspective of the image is from ground level, looking up at the towering buildings, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
